value.name: Police arrest 4 in random shootings that left 1 woman dead
value.description: The suspects were identified as Charles Harris, 19; Troy Brunetti, 18; Larry Scott, 19, and Austin Olson, 21. Each was arrested on suspicion of murder, drive-by shooting, armed robbery and two ...

value.name: Day 3, NFL Draft: Tracking the Bucs, Dolphins, Jags and all the state college players
value.description: Jaelan Phillips won’t be doing his business in the open field, but his explosion off the line builds conviction that he will be all that Dion Jordan and Charles Harris were not. As expected ...
